name: glycidyl methacrylate
itaconic acid
and sodium vinylsulfonate
FoodContactSubstance: Copolymer of vinyl acetate (CAS Reg No. 108-05-4), butyl acrylate (CAS Reg No 141-32-2), glycidyl methacrylate (CAS Reg. No. 106-91-2), itaconic acid (CAS Reg. No. 97-65-4), and sodium vinylsulfonate (CAS Reg. No. 3039-83-6).
